explanation: BTC has strong positive sentiment due to news of US government accumulation plans, technical support at 107200, and live calls for buying and holding. Multiple users anticipate big upcoming moves, with some citing recent breakouts and accumulation. Some caution exists regarding volatility and reversals, but the buy-side bias dominates. The 1-minute candlestick signal leans long due to repeated mentions of holding, buying, and support levels holding in the short term.
